entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Vanderhoof
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 PM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023
